get.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of plugin overviews based on the specified filter and pagination settings.

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: A wildcard string used to filtered plugins by name. Defaults to "*".

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page.

get.summary: Retrieves a paginated list of the latest plugin versions filtered by the specified criteria.

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: A wildcard string used to filter plugins by name. Defaults to "*".

parameters.name: versionRange
parameters.description: The semantic version range to filter the plugin versions. Defaults to all release versions.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page.

post.summary: Adds a plugin by uploading a plugin file and specifying the target Unreal Engine version.

parameters.name: engineVersion
parameters.description: The target Unreal Engine version for which the plugin is being added.

pluginFile.description: The uploaded plugin file in a valid format.

get.summary:
Retrieves detailed information about the latest version of the specified plugin,
optionally constrained by a version range.

parameters.name: pluginId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plugin to retrieve the latest version for.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: An optional version range to filter the plugin's versions. Defaults to all released versions.

get.summary: Retrieves the dependency tree for a specified plugin.

parameters.name: pluginId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plugin whose dependency tree is to be retrieved.

requestBody.description: An optional version range used to filter dependencies for the plugin.

get.summary: Downloads a plugin file as a ZIP archive for the specified plugin, engine version, and target platforms.

parameters.name: pluginId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plugin to be downloaded.

parameters.name: engineVersion
parameters.description: The Unreal Engine version for which the plugin file is requested.

parameters.name: targetVersion
parameters.description: The semantic version range that specifies the version of the plugin to target. Defaults to all release versions if not specified.

parameters.name: platforms
parameters.description: The collection of target platforms for which the plugin file is compatible.

get.summary: Downloads the specified version of a plugin as a ZIP file for the specified Unreal Engine version and target platforms.

parameters.name: pluginId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plugin to download.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plugin version to download.

parameters.name: engineVersion
parameters.description: The version of Unreal Engine compatible with the plugin.

parameters.name: platforms
parameters.description: The collection of target platforms for the plugin.

get.summary: Downloads the source code of a specific plugin version as a zip file.

parameters.name: pluginId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plugin to download.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the specific version of the plugin to download.

get.summary: Downloads the binary files of a specified plugin for a given version, engine version, and platform.

parameters.name: pluginId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plugin whose binaries are being downloaded.

parameters.name: versionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the plugin version to download binaries for.

parameters.name: engineVersion
parameters.description: The engine version for which the plugin binaries are compatible.

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: The platform for which the plugin binaries are compiled.

get.summary: Retrieves a dependency manifest containing potential versions for the given list of plugin dependencies.

requestBody.description: A list of plugin dependencies for which potential versions are to be determined.

get.summary: Retrieves an icon as a stream for the specified file name.

parameters.name: pluginName
parameters.description: The name of the plugin to search for

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the binary file.

platform.description: Gets or sets the target platform for which the binary is intended.

engineVersion.description: Gets or sets the engine version associated with the binary file or plugin.

BinariesOverview.description: Represents an overview of binary files for a specific platform and engine version.

foundDependencies.description:
A property that stores a collection of dependencies that have been successfully resolved
during the dependency resolution process.

unresolvedDependencies.description:
A property that holds a collection of dependencies that could not be resolved
during the dependency resolution process.

DependencyManifest.description: Represents a manifest of plugin dependencies resolved by the dependency resolution process.

id.description:
Gets or sets the unique identifier associated with a dependency.
This identifier is automatically generated and used to distinguish
dependencies within the system.

pluginName.description:
Gets or sets the name of the plugin associated with the dependency.
The plugin name is a required field and must adhere to the predefined naming rules.

pluginVersion.description:
Gets or sets the version range associated with the plugin dependency.
This version range defines the compatible versions of the plugin required by the dependency.

optional.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dependency is optional.
When set to true, the dependency is not mandatory, and the system
can function without it.

DependencyOverview.description: Represents an overview of a plugin dependency, including its metadata and type.

pluginName.description: Gets the name of the plugin.

pluginVersion.description: Gets the version range of the dependent plugin.

PluginDependency.description: Represents a dependency of a plugin within the Unreal Plugin Manager framework.

versions.description:
Gets or sets the collection of versions associated with the plugin.
Each version provides a detailed overview including its version number
and unique identifier.

PluginDetails.description:
Represents detailed information about a plugin, including its associated versions.
Inherits from UnrealPluginManager.Core.Model.Plugins.PluginOverviewBase to provide core metadata.

versions.description:
Gets or sets the collection of versions associated with the plugin.
Each version provides a detailed overview including its version number
and unique identifier.

PluginOverview.description:
Represents an overview of a plugin, providing basic information such as its ID, name,
optional friendly name, description, and associated versions.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the plugin.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the plugin.

friendlyName.description: Gets or sets the user-friendly name of the plugin, which may be used for display purposes.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the plugin, providing detailed information about its purpose or functionality.

authorName.description: Gets or sets the name of the author associated with the plugin.

authorWebsite.description: Gets or sets the URL associated with the author of the plugin.

PluginOverviewBase.description:
Provides a base class for representing essential metadata of a plugin.
This includes core properties such as the plugin's unique identifier, name,
optional friendly name, description, author's name, and website.

pageNumber.description: The current page number of the result set.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages in the result set.

pageSize.description: The number of items on each page.

count.description: The total number of items available in the result set.

items.description: An array of items on the current page.

PluginOverviewPage.description: Represents the output of a paged query of PluginOverview.

pluginId.description:
Gets the unique identifier of the plugin.
This property is required and serves as the primary identifier for the plugin within the system.

name.description:
Gets the name of the plugin.
This property is required and uniquely identifies the plugin within the context of the plugin system.

friendlyName.description:
Gets or sets an optional user-friendly name for the plugin.
This property provides a more descriptive or colloquial name that can be displayed in user interfaces
and used as an alternative to the plugin's primary name when needed.

versionId.description:
Gets the unique identifier of the plugin version.
This property ensures that each version of a plugin is distinctly identifiable within the system.

version.description:
Gets the semantic version of the plugin.
This property adheres to the semantic versioning format and is used to specify the version details of the plugin.

PluginSummary.description: Represents a summary of a plugin, including its name, version, and optional description.

PluginType.description: Specifies the type of plugin in the Unreal Plugin Manager system.

pluginId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for a plugin.

name.description: Gets the name of the plugin associated with the current version.

friendlyName.description: Gets or sets the user-friendly name of the plugin associated with the current version.

versionId.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the plugin version.

version.description: Gets the semantic version of the plugin.

dependencies.description: Gets or sets the list of dependencies for the current plugin version.

PluginVersionInfo.description: Represents detailed information about a specific version of a plugin.

pageNumber.description: The current page number of the result set.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages in the result set.

pageSize.description: The number of items on each page.

count.description: The total number of items available in the result set.

items.description: An array of items on the current page.

PluginVersionInfoPage.description: Represents the output of a paged query of PluginVersionInfo.

dependencies.description:
A collection of dependency overviews associated with a specific version of a plugin.
Each dependency overview provides information about dependent plugins, including their metadata, version requirements, and optionality.

binaries.description:
A collection of binary overviews associated with a specific version of a plugin.
Each binary overview provides details about the platform and engine version it supports.

VersionDetails.description:
Represents detailed information about a specific plugin version,
including its version number, unique identifier, and list of associated binaries.

id.description: Gets or sets the unique identifier for this instance.

version.description: Gets or sets the semantic version of the plugin, representing its specific version details.

VersionOverview.description: Represents a specific version of a plugin, identified by a unique ID and version number.
